metadata.title: CVE-2021-47487 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix out of bounds writeSize can be any value and is user controlled resulting in overwriting the40 byte array wr_buf with an arbitrary length of data from buf.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
